Keywords: Avengers , Celebrity , Fantastic Four , Lady Liberators , Scientist
Real Name: Sue Storm
Special Powers
INVISIBLE BARRIER: Invisible Woman may start the game with the Invisible Barrier. If the Invisible Barrier is attached, Invisible Woman and adjacent friendly characters can use Energy Shield/Deflection. When Invisible Woman takes damage, remove the Invisible Barrier.
MARVEL'S FIRST FAMILY: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When a Invisible Woman heals from the Fantastic Four Team Ability, after resolutions remove an action token and modify Invisible Woman's combat values +1 until the end of your next turn.
SHIELDS UP!: Barrier. When she uses it, after resolutions attach the Invisible Barrier.
YOU CAN'T SEE WHAT I'M ABOUT TO DO TO YOU...: Force Blast, Penetrating/Psychic Blast, Telekinesis. If the Invisible Barrier is attached, modify range +3.
Linked Units

Fixes the major flaw of the original: not starting with the barrier attached when the power to equip it is on her SECOND click. The First Family trait is a welcome addition. Happy that this amazing sculpt has been brought into the modern game.
